title: FT/FS: EPDG's - Pick which one I am gonna keep. CARDS ADDED 10/24
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: EPDG's - Pick which one I am gonna keep. CARDS ADDED 10/24
posts.post_content:
+++ 10/24 ADDED CRAVATH AND MCALEESE IN POST BELOW.+++

Currently have 146 unique EPDG's but have a few dupes I'd like to trade if possible.  I have Seven EPDG dupes.  Both are available for trade.  

Looking to trade for ones I don't have. But once one is traded, the other goes back in the box.

You decide.

Better scans are here:
[URL="http://s856.photobucket.com/user/thromdog/library/Available?sort=3&page=1"]http://s856.photobucket.com/user/thromdog/library/Available?sort=3&page=1[/URL]

Also will entertain $$ offers.

Few things I want to note on the cards themselves
1. Dubuc is one of the most difficult EPDG's to find so I will want a premium
2. Joss SGC 10 has a pinhole in his hat
3. Jones SGC 10 has an pressed seal (into the card) around his head.  It's actually pretty cool.



[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=207663&d=1444506132[/IMG]
[URL=http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=207664&d=]Attachment 207664[/URL]
[URL=http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=207665&d=]Attachment 207665[/URL]
Hi Jeff, nice EPDG cards, i have always really liked that back... would you trade for other T206 back cards, (Old Mill, Polar Bear, etc?)  or are you really looking just for EPDG's in trade?

Jeff PM sent.


Thanks Bob I.

A few more available. Also added it to my photobucket if you want the closer scan.....
